document_data.name: Cook's Special Dumplings
document_data.mainbody: '''Cook's special dumplings''' were a culinary creation of [[Geldorf Tinbasher|Geldorf "The Cook" Tinbasher]], a stern [[dwarf|dwarven]] chef from [[Thay]], active in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description:
Cook's special dumplings were hand-shaped savory little morsels that exuded mouth-watering scent making it hard not to devour the entire batch. These dumplings also had more practical use, especially helpful for gladiators of Thay. When consumed before battle, each dumpling invigorated the eater, giving them an upper hand when striking their opponents.

Another reason not to eat an entire batch at the time - severe indigestion.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], Geldorf Tinbasher offered the [[Champion of Baeloth's Pit]] freshly made ''special dumplings'' in exchange for a piece of [[the Concocter]], a [[myconid]] [[potion]] maker, during the Champion's stay within the gladiatorial pits of [[Thay]].
